name: Mikazuki Munechika
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your damage zone.・3 or more cards - This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・4 or more cards - Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.・5 or more cards - [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: “I'm Mikazuki Munechika. My name comes from the crescent moon shapes on my blade. Nice to meet you.”

name: Oodenta Mitsuyo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it.
flavor: “Odenta Mitsuyo, one of the Tenga Goken. Perhaps you should have just left me sealed in the storage shed...”

name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit and one of your other rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's units, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn. If you persona rode this turn, [Stand] all of your rear-guards.
flavor: “My name is Juzumaru Tsunetsugu. I hold faith with the Buddhism doctrines, searching for an answer in the long period of time, where even the values of humans change.”

name: Onimaru Kunitsuna
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: “...I'm Onimaru Kunitsuna. I saw it in a dream. The arrival of an oni at your doorstep.”

name: Shokudaikiri Mitsutada
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: “I'm Shokudaikiri Mitsutada, named after...a candlestick I cut in two. I know, pretty lame, right?”

name: Kasen Kanesada Kiwame
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] any number of your rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each unit [Rest] for this cost. [CONT](VC):During the battle that this unit attacked, if this unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: “What do you make of these clothes? Can you see the intent to convey a sense of gracefulness?”

name: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent has no back row rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +2000. (Active on opponent's turn too)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it. Then, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open back row (RC).
flavor: “I'm only tryna match my master's ambitions. Nothing else. Now, what d'ya say we go conquer the world?”

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):You may pay "[Soul-Blast 1 "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame"" for this cost. When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose up to one card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: “Being a reproduction no longer bothers me. My role as a Touken is to serve you. That's all I ever needed.”

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If you have five rear-guards, all of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +5000, and all of your back row rear-guards get "boost". (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: “Behold the splendor of a true Kotetsu. I'll soon show you my looks don't deceive, master.”

name: Tsurumaru Kuninaga
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and swap its position with this unit.
flavor: “Hey. I'm Tsurumaru Kuninaga. You really lucked out getting me in your ranks. Even if I do say so myself...”

name: Iwatooshi
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have four or more grade 1 or less units, when this unit would attack a vanguard, it also battles all of your opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guards.
flavor: “Huh, kinda small, aren't ya? Well, I guess everyone is small compared to Benkei though, ha! Call me Iwatooshi, nice to meet ya.”

name: Ichigo Hitofuri
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have three or more rear-guards with "Toushirou" in their card names, this unit gets [Power] +10000. [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if this unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of that battle.
flavor: “My name is Ichigo Hitofuri. I am the sole tachi created by the hand of Awataguchi Yoshimitsu.”

name: Ookanehira
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, [COST][discard two cards from your hand], choose one of your units with [Power] greater than this unit, and this unit's [Power] increases or decreases to 5000 greater than that unit's [Power] until end of that battle.
flavor: “I'm Ookanehira, a blade of unparalleled beauty and dignity chosen by none other than Ikeda Terumasa. However...”

name: Uguisumaru
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to one "Ookanehira" from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. If you did not reveal a card, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: “I'm Uguisumaru, from Kobizen. I've got no idea why I'm called that. Maybe it means something, maybe it doesn't. Anyway, looking forward to working with you!”

name: Hotarumaru
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, it gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) during your opponent's turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and put this card from your drop into your hand.
flavor: “I'm Hotarumaru, all the way from Aso Shrine! Tadaaa! Nailed it.”

name: Monoyoshi Sadamune
effect: [CONT]Back Row (RC):When this unit's [Power] would be increased by your trigger effect, double the value of that increase. (If +10000, it becomes +20000)
flavor: “Hello, I'm Monoyoshi Sadamune! I might just be your lucky sword!”

name: Taikogane Sadamune
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to two cards from your hand, and call them to open (RC). If you called two cards, draw a card.
flavor: “I'm the one and only Taikogane Sadamune. Let's go crazyyy!”

name: Kousetsu Samonji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand] and this unit gets [Shield] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: “I am Kousetsu Samonji. I long to see a world where we are no longer called upon to fight...”

name: Izuminokami Kanesada
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and if it is boosted by "Horikawa Kunihiro", when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: “I'm Izuminokami Kanesada. Strong and stylish. Stylishly strong. It's no wonder I'm so popular these days!”

name: Horikawa Kunihiro
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a , [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], draw a card, and if it is boosting "Izuminokami Kanesada", this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “Hello? Oh, hello! You wouldn't happen to have seen my partner around here would you? Izuminokami Kanesada. Me? Oh, yeah! I'm Horikawa Kunihiro!”

name: Higekiri
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If "Hizamaru" is on your (GC) or front row (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: “Greetings, I am Higekiri, treasure of the Genji clan. You are the one who will wield my power this time around, yes?”

name: Hizamaru
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC): If "Higekiri" is on your (GC) or front row (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: “I am Hizamaru, the (other) treasure of the Genji clan. Mayhap, my brother is already here?”

name: Ookurikara
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while not boosted, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle. If you have no face up cards in your damage zone, it gets [Power] +15000 instead of +10000.
flavor: “I'm Ookurikara. I've got nothing to say to you. Let's get this over with.”

name: Shishiou
effect: [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects. [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I'm Shishiou, the jet black tachi. I'm pretty stylish, huh? Now I'm here, you'd better make good use of me.”

name: Kogarasumaru
effect: [CONT]Front Row (RC):When your Over@ trigger would be removed by its trigger effect, you may put it into your hand instead of removing it.
flavor: “My name is Kogarasumaru. It is my destiny to engage in battle. That has not changed in a thousand years, nor will it ever.”

name: Kenshin Kagemitsu
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that this unit boosted, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I'm Kenshin Kagemitsu. Don't go underestimating me!”

name: Tonbokiri
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000. [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit is [Rest] by a card's cost, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: “It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. I am known as Tonbokiri. I am yours to command.”

name: Koryuu Kagemitsu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], and draw a card.
flavor: “I'm Koryuu Kagemitsu. Just a lonesome traveler looking for a place to call his own...”

name: Kasen Kanesada Toku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Kasen Kanesada Kiwame", [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “How cruel this world is, that art cannot be cultivated without power...”

name: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Toku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Kiwame", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it. If no units were retired, draw a card. [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “Hahaha! Looks like I'm moving up in the world!”

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Toku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame", [COST][discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to one "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “It doesn't matter how strong I become. At the end of the day, I'm still just a copy.”

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu Toku
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Hachisuka Kotetsu Sentou", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Urashima Kotetsu", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.[CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “A counterfeit could never reach these heights!”

name: Nagasone Kotetsu
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have another unit with "Kotetsu" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: “I'm Nagasone Kotetsu. I may be a forgery, but I'll work as hard as any real Kotetsu sword.”

name: Taroutachi
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a "Jiroutachi" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: “...Oh, I walk the material plane once more. I am Taroutachi, a sword no common mortal was ever able to wield in battle.”

name: Jiroutachi
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a "Taroutachi" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: “Hey, so I'm the beautiful Jirou! Why, you aren't rocking too much. Well, regards to you!”

name: Nihongou
effect: [CONT](RC):During the battle that this unit attacked, if it is the first battle of this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: “I'm Nihongou, one of Japan's greatest spears. I haven't kept you waitin' too long, have I?”

name: Otegine
effect: [CONT](RC):If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, when this unit would attack, it battles all of the units in one of your opponent's columns.
flavor: “I'm Otegine, one of the Tenga Sanmeiso, the finest of all spears. I'm not great at hacking or slashing, but if it's piercing action you want, I'm your man!”

name: Hyuuga Masamune
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.
flavor: “I'm Hyuuga Masamune. I've drifted my way to this place.”

name: Yamanbagiri Chougi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have no other units in the same column, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, move this unit to the back row.
flavor: “I'm the original creation by Chougi, Yamanbagiri. What's wrong? Staring at me so intently.”

name: Hakusanyoshimitsu
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: “I am Hakusanyoshimitsu. A sword forged by Yoshimitsu. I am also used as a dowry item and a tool to pray for the afterlife. I ask for your care.”

name: Nankaitarouchouson
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and perform one of the following. If you retired your opponent's back row rear-guard this turn, perform all of them instead. ・This unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.・Draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: “I am Nankaitarouchouson. Call me Chouson if you find it too long.”

name: Hizen Tadahiro
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits a vanguard, if your opponent's back row rear-guard was retired this turn, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: “…Hizen Tadahiro. I'm used to seeing blood. So, who's next?”

name: Suishinshi Masahide
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Minamoto Kiyomaro", call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: “I am Suishinshi Masahide. Don't underestimate me just because I was born in peace.”

name: Minamoto Kiyomaro
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Suishinshi Masahide", call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: “I'm Minamoto Kiyomaro. Inheriting the name from one of the three famed creations. Nice to meet you.”

name: Sanchoumou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: “Ah, the birds are calling. One of the thirty-five selected by the Uesugi family, unmarked. You can call me Sanchoumou. Have the birds from my clan gathered yet?”

name: Kokindenjunotachi
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards, [Stand] it, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “...I, Kokindenjunotachi, am here.”

name: Jizou Yukihira
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is [Rest] by a card's cost, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “Lives connected. /I suppose this is karma... Jizou Yukihira, reporting.”

name: Kogitsunemaru
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If this unit's [Power] is 13000 or less, this unit cannot attack.
flavor: ““Small fox”? Who told you that's what my name means? No, no, no. It's “grand fox”. I'm the greatest, grandest fox of them all!”

name: Sohayanotsurugi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], choose one of your vanguards, search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as that card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: “Sohayanotsurugi Utsusunari, these are the words carved in to my blade. Just a replica of a greater sword.”

name: Namazuo Toushirou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Honebami Toushirou" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: “My name is Namazuo Toushirou. I've got a pretty patchy memory but that's not going to stop me doing my job!”

name: Honebami Toushirou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Namazuo Toushirou" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: “My name is Honebami Toushirou. Other than my name, I have few memories.”

name: Hirano Toushirou
flavor: “I am Hirano Toushirou. Please allow me to accompany you.”

name: Gotou Toushirou
flavor: “Hey, I'm Gotou Toushirou. I know, I know; pretty tall for a tantou, right!”

name: Shinano Toushirou
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack this unit boosted hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: “I'm Shinano Toushirou. Not to brag, but I'm by far the prettiest of all of my brothers!”

name: Maeda Toushirou
flavor: “Greetings. My name is Maeda Toushirou. I shall serve you in perpetuity.”

name: Akita Toushirou
flavor: “Hi, hi, I'm Akita Toushirou. Wow, the outside is so pretty!”

name: Yagen Toushirou
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: “Hey, Captain. The name's Yagen Toushirou. Looking forward to working with ya.”

name: Houchou Toushirou
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have another unit with "Toushirou" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: “Hai hai, I'm Houchou Toushirou. I like candy and good cooks! And more candy!”

name: Akashi Kuniyuki
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a "Aizen Kunitoshi" on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000. [CONT](GC):If you have a "Hotarumaru" on your (RC), this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: “Hullo. I'm Akashi Kuniyuki. Nice to meet ya!”

name: Aizen Kunitoshi
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit boosted a <Touken Danshi - Ootachi>, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose a <Touken Danshi - Ootachi> or <Touken Danshi - Tachi> on your (RC), and return it to your hand.
flavor: “I'm Aizen Kunitoshi! See this shirt? This is Aizen Myouou, he's got my back! What's that? On the front, you say? Well, yeah, but he's got my BACK!”

name: Sengo Muramasa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] two of your other rear-guards], your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, and retires it.
flavor: “Ha ha ha ha. You may call me Sengo Muramasa. That's right, the demon blade! Ha ha ha ha.”

name: Kikkou Sadamune
effect: [CONT](RC):You may choose to not [Stand] this unit in your stand phase.[AUTO](RC):At the beginning of your main phase, if this unit is [Rest], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I'm Kikkou Sadamune. What does my name mean? Can't a poor sword have a little secret or two?”

name: Daihannya Nagamitsu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed for the first call this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (Can activate when multiple units are called at the same time)[CONT](RC):When you would look at your deck, you can only look at the top card of your deck. (When searching your deck or looking at two or more cards, look at only the top card instead. Resolve all other effects normally)
flavor: “It is a pleasure to meet you. My name is Daihannya Nagamitsu. I am the crowning achievement of the swordsmith Nagamitsu, from the Osafune school.”

name: Souza Samonji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have two or more [Rest] units, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: “My name is Souza Samonji. Do you also desire to wield me merely as a symbol of conquest?”

name: Sayo Samonji
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have three or more other [Rest] units, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
flavor: “I am Sayo Samonji. Do you also seek revenge?”

name: Kasen Kanesada Sentou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Kasen Kanesada Toku", choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.[CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “I am Kasen Kanesada, a sword of Nosada!”

name: Kasen Kanesada
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: “Greetings. I am Kasen Kanesada, a man of culture and purveyor of fine arts. I hope that our time together is pleasant and refined.”

name: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Sentou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Toku", choose up to one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it. If no units were retired, [Soul-Charge 1]. [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “Alright, the battle begins!”

name: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: “I'm Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki. Let's start with some light exercise, then we can think about taking over the world!”

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Sentou
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Toku", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card. [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “…Here I go!”

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: “Yamanbagiri Kunihiro. You don't have to say anything. I know, you're disappointed that I'm just a copy...”

name: Yamabushi Kunihiro
effect: [CONT](GC):If your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Shield] +5000. [AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (RC) or (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and put this card on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: “Bwahaha! My name is Yamabushi Kunihiro. I have dedicated my life to reaching enlightenment!”

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu Sentou
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & reveal two cards with "Hachisuka Kotetsu" in their card names from your ride deck], choose a card from your drop, and put it into your hand.[CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: “Hachisuka Kotetsu, moving in!”

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: “I'm Hachisuka Kotetsu. I am most positively, most definitely, 100% NOT a fake. Understand?”

name: Urashima Kotetsu
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have another unit in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +5000. (Active on opponent's turn too)
flavor: “How's it going? I'm Urashima Kotetsu! Wanna explore the Dragon Palace with me? We'll need to work out how to get there first, though.”

name: Doudanuki Masakuni
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I'm Doudanuki Masakuni. If you ask me, weapons just need to be strong. If we're fit for purpose, appearances shouldn't matter. Simplicity and fortitude is the best, isn't it?”

name: Tomoegata Naginata
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose two of your units, and they get [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I am Tomoegata Naginata. I have no inscription, no history, I have not a single story to my name. But perhaps that is about to change?”

name: Mouri Toushirou
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: “I'm Mouri Toushirou. I took my name from my former owners, the Mouri clan. Let's work hard together!”

name: Kotegirigou
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and move this unit to your (GC). (This is not an intercept)
flavor: “I'm Kotegirigou, a wakizashi made by Go no Yoshihiro. I'll do my best to be of use to you.”

name: Azuki Nagamitsu
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and your opponent cannot intercept.
flavor: “Hello there, I'm Azuki Nagamitsu. Say...do you like sweets, by any chance?”

name: Shizukagata Naginata
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you have no face up cards in your damage zone, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: “I'm Shizukagata, a naginata. I've got neither title nor story, but that we can work on.”

name: Nansen Ichimonji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “The real me is supposed to be a tall, terrifying Touken Danshi who can silence even a crying child. But... how did it come to this... It's that curse! The cat's curse... meoow!... *purr*”

name: Chiyoganemaru
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Chiganemaru" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: “Chiyoganemaru. Born in Yamato, raised in Ryukyu. Don't worry about me too much. I don't like being bundled up as Japanese swords.”

name: Buzengou
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Put this unit into your soul], choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: “Forged by Go no Yoshihiro, a famed sword, Buzengou. I heard that I can sing and dance... Well, I won't lose anyone when running.”

name: Nenekirimaru
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.
flavor: “Nenekirimaru. That is my name. Mountains are fine thing.”

name: Chatannakiri
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you chose "Chiyoganemaru" or "Chiganemaru", [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: “Haisai! I'm Chatannakiri. They call me that because some say I used to be a cooking knife.”

name: Kuwanagou
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may [Counter-Charge 1] or [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: “I am Kuwanagou, a famed Touken crafted by Go no Yoshihiro. To win in battle is to come face-to-face with the earth. Agriculture is a study that lets you face every phenomena of nature.”

name: Matsuigou
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your opponent's damage zone has three or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: “I am Matsuigou, a famed sword forged by Go no Yoshihiro. I'm one to let shed rather than twirl and sing. Shed what? ...Ha, blood, of course.”

name: Chiganemaru
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a "Chiyoganemaru" from your drop, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: “Haisai! I am Chiganemaru. Younger brother to the nankuru naisa, things will work out, Dai-ni and Chi-ni. Please look after us all.”

name: Nikkou Ichimonji
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: “With a tome in my right hand, and a conch in my left, I, Nikkou Ichimonji, have come to join the fight.”

name: Taikou Samonji
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: “I am Taikou Samonji. I was named after Houtaikou. But even so, I don't want to be called a monkey. Understand?”

name: Samidaregou
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that this unit's attack hit, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into your soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.
flavor: “I am Samidaregou, a famed sword forged by Go no Yoshihiro. Oh? This is just a little token for my previous master. I actually have far stronger feelings for someone else whom I share the time we stood together. The one who gave me my name...”

name: Mikazuki Munechika
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, perform all of the following according to the number of cards in your damage zone.・3 or more cards - Until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.・4 or more cards - Look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or bottom of your deck.・5 or more cards - [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Oodenta Mitsuyo
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, if you persona rode this turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it.

name: Juzumaru Tsunetsugu
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit and one of your other rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's units, and it gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn. If you persona rode this turn, [Stand] all of your rear-guards.

name: Onimaru Kunitsuna
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit on the bottom of your deck.

name: Shokudaikiri Mitsutada
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Kasen Kanesada Kiwame
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] any number of your rear-guards], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each unit [Rest] for this cost.[CONT](VC):During the battle that this unit attacked, if this unit's [Power] is 30000 or greater, when your opponent would call cards from their hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.

name: Mutsunokami Yoshiyuki Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If your opponent has no back row rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +2000.[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and retire it. Then, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your opponent's open back row (RC).

name: Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If you persona rode this turn, this unit gets [Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):You may pay "[Soul-Blast 1 "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro Kiwame"" for this cost. When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], draw a card, choose up to one card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).

name: Hachisuka Kotetsu Kiwame
effect: [CONT](VC):If you have five rear-guards, all of your front row rear-guards get [Power] +5000, and all of your back row rear-guards get "boost".

name: Tsurumaru Kuninaga
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1] &[Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and swap its position with this unit.
